com.github.noraui.application.steps

Class FileSteps

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.noraui.application.steps.Step
      • com.github.noraui.application.steps.FileSteps
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IStep

    public class FileSteps
extends Step
    This class contains Gherkin callable steps that handle file uploading and downloading.

    • Method Detail

      • cleanDownloadDirectory

        @Lorsque(value="Je vide le repertoire des t\u00e9l\u00e9chargements(\\?)")
 @Given(value="I clean download directory(\\?)")
public void cleanDownloadDirectory(List<GherkinStepCondition> conditions)
        Empties the default downloaded files folder.
        Parameters:
        conditions - List of 'expected' values condition and 'actual' values (GherkinStepCondition).

      • removefileInDownloadDirectory

        @Lorsque(value="Je supprime le fichier {string} dans repertoire des t\u00e9l\u00e9chargements(\\?)")
 @Given(value="I remove {string} file in download directory(\\?)")
public void removefileInDownloadDirectory(String file,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                  List<GherkinStepCondition> conditions)
        Remove a file in the default downloaded files folder
        Parameters:
        file - The name of the file removed.
        conditions - List of 'expected' values condition and 'actual' values (GherkinStepCondition).

      • checkFile

        @Alors(value="Le fichier {string} encod\u00e9 en {string} v\u00e9rifie {string}(\\?)")
 @Then(value="The file {string} encoded in {string} matches {string}(\\?)")
public void checkFile(String file,
                                                                                                                                                                                         String encoding,
                                                                                                                                                                                         String regexp,
                                                                                                                                                                                         List<GherkinStepCondition> conditions)
                                                                                                                                                                                  throws TechnicalException,
                                                                                                                                                                                         FailureException
        Checks that a file in the default downloaded files folder matches the given regexp.
        Parameters:
        file - The name of the file
        encoding - The file encoding
        regexp - The pattern to match
        conditions - List of 'expected' values condition and 'actual' values (GherkinStepCondition).
        Throws:
        FailureException - if the scenario encounters a functional error
        TechnicalException - is thrown if you have a technical error (format, configuration, datas, ...) in NoraUi. Exception with "FAIL_MESSAGE_FILE_NOT_MATCHES" message (with screenshot, no exception)

      • waitDownloadFile

        @Lorsque(value="J\'attends que le fichier nomm\u00e9 {string} soit t\u00e9l\u00e9charg\u00e9 avec un timeout de {int} seconde(s)(\\?)")
 @Then(value="I wait file named {string} to be downloaded with timeout of {int} second(s)(\\?)")
public void waitDownloadFile(String file,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      int timeout,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      List<GherkinStepCondition> conditions)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               throws InterruptedException,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      FailureException,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      TechnicalException
        Waits the full download of a file with a maximum timeout in seconds.
        Parameters:
        file - The name of the file to download
        timeout - The maximum timeout
        conditions - List of 'expected' values condition and 'actual' values (GherkinStepCondition).
        Throws:
        InterruptedException - Exception for the sleep
        FailureException - if the scenario encounters a functional error
        TechnicalException - is thrown if you have a technical error (format, configuration, datas, ...) in NoraUi. Exception with "FAIL_MESSAGE_DOWNLOADED_FILE_NOT_FOUND" message (with screenshot, no exception)

      • uploadFile

        @Lorsque(value="J\'utilise l\'\u00e9l\u00e9ment {page-element} pour uploader le fichier {string}(\\?)")
 @Then(value="I use {page-element} element to upload {string} file(\\?)")
public void uploadFile(Page.PageElement pageElement,
                                                                                                                                                                                                         String filename,
                                                                                                                                                                                                         List<GherkinStepCondition> conditions)
                                                                                                                                                                                                  throws FailureException,
                                                                                                                                                                                                         TechnicalException
        Waits the full download of a file.
        Parameters:
        pageElement - The concerned page of field AND key of PageElement concerned (sample: $demo.DemoPage-button)
        filename - The name of the file to upload (from the default downloaded files directory)
        conditions - List of 'expected' values condition and 'actual' values (GherkinStepCondition).
        Throws:
        FailureException - if the scenario encounters a functional error
        TechnicalException - is thrown if you have a technical error (format, configuration, datas, ...) in NoraUi. Exception with "FAIL_MESSAGE_UPLOADING_FILE" message (with screenshot, no exception)
